item.description:
How about ice skating in Cambridge? (Easily accessible by the T)

300 Athenaeum Street
Cambridge, MA 02139

Only $5pp and $8 to rent skates!

They also have hot drinks and snacks.

Then I figured we could grab dinner somewhere around there - I'm open to suggestions!

**time is tentative/negotiable**
item.why: Sorry everyone but the impending rain storm has mandated we change ice skating to something indoors.
item.name: Fire and Ice -- Jillians -- House of Blues
